original: @239a * // de ni de'i gzugs brnyan lta bu zhig ste /
analyzed: @239a * // de ni de'i gzugs brnyan lta bu zhig ste /
translated: It is like a reflection of that.

original: de la gzigs nas bsam gtan dang mngon par mkhyen pa mngon du ma mdzad bzhin du ma 'ongs pa mkhyen pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de la gzigs nas bsam gtan dang mngon par mkhyen pa mngon du ma mdzad bzhin du ma 'ongs pa mkhyen pa yin gyi /
translated: Having seen that, he knows the future without realizing the meditative development of the superknowledges.

original: mngon sum du mdzad pas mngon sum du gzigs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum du mdzad pas mngon sum du gzigs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: He does not see it directly by realizing it.

original: mkhyen pa de ni du ba las me ltar rjes su dpag pa las byung ba yin te /
analyzed: mkhyen pa de ni du ba las me ltar rjes su dpag pa las byung ba yin te /
translated: That knowledge is derived from inference, like fire from smoke.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa mngon sum nyid kyi phyir ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa mngon sum nyid kyi phyir ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not derived from direct perception of the relation between cause and result.

original: de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa la mi ltos pa kho nar 'das pa mkhyen pa de bzhin du 'das pa la mi ltos par yang ma 'ongs pa mkhyen pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa la mi ltos pa kho nar 'das pa mkhyen pa de bzhin du 'das pa la mi ltos par yang ma 'ongs pa mkhyen pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, just as the past is known without relying on the future, so too the future is known without relying on the past.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i go rims nges par med na bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhed pa tsam gyis ma 'ongs pa che ge mo zhig gi mjug thogs su ma 'ongs pa 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba mkhyen /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i go rims nges par med na bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhed pa tsam gyis ma 'ongs pa che ge mo zhig gi mjug thogs su ma 'ongs pa 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba mkhyen /
translated: If there is no definite order of the future, then the BhagavƒÅn knows that this future state arises after that future state, merely by his wish.

original: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa yin zhes te /
analyzed: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa yin zhes te /
translated: Thus the BhagavƒÅn is omniscient.

original: gzugs la sogs pa yul da ltar ba rnams mig gi rnam par shes pa dag gis nyams su ma bstar bar yid kyi rnam par shes pas mkhyen pa ni ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa yul da ltar ba rnams mig gi rnam par shes pa dag gis nyams su ma bstar bar yid kyi rnam par shes pas mkhyen pa ni ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But is it not the case that the BhagavƒÅn knows present objects such as form with his mental consciousness, without engaging them with eye consciousness and so on?

original: 'di'i lan du sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: 'di'i lan du sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: In response to this, the root text states, ‚ÄúThe domain of the buddhas is inconceivable.‚Äù

original: ma 'ongs pa'i go rims nges par gnas pa med na zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i go rims nges par gnas pa med na zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
translated: If there is no definite order of the future, then the BhagavƒÅn would not know the future.

original: nges par gnas pa'i nges par byed pa'i rgyu ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rgyu yin na /
analyzed: nges par gnas pa'i nges par byed pa'i rgyu ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rgyu yin na /
translated: The cause that definitely establishes it is the equivalent immediately preceding condition.

original: de ni ma 'ongs pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni ma 'ongs pa med pa yin no //
translated: But that does not exist in the future.üîΩWhy is it that the future does not have equivalent immediately preceding conditions?

original: ci'i phyir chos kyi mchog gi 'jug thogs su zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir chos kyi mchog gi 'jug thogs su zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: The cause that definitely generates it is the equivalent immediately preceding condition.üîΩBut since that does not exist in the future, it would follow that it would arise without a cause.üîΩWhy is it that the future does not have equivalent immediately preceding conditions?üîΩThe cause that definitely generates it is the equivalent immediately preceding condition.

original: skye ba nges pa'i rgyu ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen yin na /
analyzed: skye ba nges pa'i rgyu ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen yin na /
translated: But since that does not exist in the future, it would follow that it would arise without a cause.üîΩWhy is it that the future does not have equivalent immediately preceding conditions?üîΩThe cause that definitely generates it is the equivalent immediately preceding condition.

original: de ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na med pas nges pa med par skye bar thar bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na med pas nges pa med par skye bar thar bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But since that does not exist in the future, it would follow that it would arise without a cause.üîΩWhy is it that the future does not have equivalent immediately preceding conditions?üîΩThe cause that definitely generates it is the equivalent immediately preceding condition.

original: gang zhig gang la rag las te skye ba zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: gang zhig gang la rag las te skye ba zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: But since that does not exist in the future, it would follow that it would arise without a cause.üîΩWhy is it that the future does not have equivalent immediately preceding conditions?

original: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa skye ba ni chos kyi mchog la rag las pa yin gyi /
analyzed: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa skye ba ni chos kyi mchog la rag las pa yin gyi /
translated: The cause that definitely generates it is the equivalent immediately preceding condition.üîΩBut since that does not exist in the future, it would follow that it would arise without a cause.

original: gzhan la rag las pa 'am bzlog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la rag las pa 'am bzlog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Why is it that the future does not have equivalent immediately preceding conditions?üîΩThe cause that definitely generates it is the equivalent immediately preceding condition.

original: de'i phyir chos kyi mchog ni mjug thogs su sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa kho na skye'i /
analyzed: de'i phyir chos kyi mchog ni mjug thogs su sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa kho na skye'i /
translated: But since that does not exist in the future, it would follow that it would arise without a cause.

original: chos gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: Why is it that the future does not have equivalent immediately preceding conditions?üîΩThe cause that definitely generates it is the equivalent immediately preceding condition.üîΩBut since that does not exist in the future, it would follow that it would arise without a cause.üîΩWhy is it that the future does not have equivalent immediately preceding conditions?üîΩThe cause that definitely generates it is the equivalent immediately preceding condition.üîΩBut since that does not exist in the future, it would follow that it would arise without a cause.üîΩWhy is it that the future does not have equivalent immediately preceding conditions?üîΩThe cause that definitely generates it is the equivalent immediately preceding condition.üîΩBut since that does not exist in the future, it would follow that it would arise without a cause.üîΩWhy is it that the future does not have equivalent immediately preceding conditions?üîΩThe cause that definitely generates it is the equivalent immediately preceding condition.

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: The same should be said for other things.

original: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen med na /
analyzed: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen med na /
translated: If there is no immediately preceding condition,

original: de la rag las pa gang @239b gis byas she na /
analyzed: de la rag las pa gang @239b gis byas she na /
translated: by what is the order of seed, sprout, and so on determined?

original: nus pa tha dad pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: nus pa tha dad pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because their power is different.

original: de lta ma yin na sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kho na la mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen nges pas mthun pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen med pa'i phyir sa bon dang myu gu la sogs pa rnams kyi go rims nges pa med par 'gyur
analyzed: de lta ma yin na sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kho na la mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen nges pas mthun pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen med pa'i phyir sa bon dang myu gu la sogs pa rnams kyi go rims nges pa med par 'gyur
translated: If that were not so, then since mind and mental factors are definitely the immediately preceding condition, the order of seed, sprout, and so on would not be determined because there would be no homogeneous immediately preceding condition.

original: na / sa bon dang myu gu rnams la go rims nges pa mthong ba yang yin no //
analyzed: na / sa bon dang myu gu rnams la go rims nges pa mthong ba yang yin no //
translated: But the order of seed, sprout, and so on is seen to be determined.

original: de'i phyir / nus pa tha dad pa'i phyir gang zhig skye ba gang la rag las pa kho na de'i mjug thogs su skye'i gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir / nus pa tha dad pa'i phyir gang zhig skye ba gang la rag las pa kho na de'i mjug thogs su skye'i gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because their power is different, that which arises in dependence on something arises immediately after that, not from something else.

original: sems gzhan dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sems gzhan dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because it is not related to another mind.

original: 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba tha ma dag ni /üîΩsems dang sems las byung ba gzhan dang 'brel pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba tha ma dag ni / sems dang sems las byung ba gzhan dang 'brel pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus the final minds and mental factors of an arhatüîΩare not related to other minds and mental factors.üîΩThe final minds and mental factors of an arhat are not related to other minds and mental factors because they are not related to other minds.üîΩIf they were related to other minds, they would not be final.

original: de dag gi tha ma nyid ni sems gzhan dang 'brel pa med pa nyid kyi phyir yin te /
analyzed: de dag gi tha ma nyid ni sems gzhan dang 'brel pa med pa nyid kyi phyir yin te /
translated: Therefore they are not equivalent immediately preceding conditions.

original: de lta ma yin na tha ma nyid du mi 'gyur ro //üîΩde'i phyir de dag mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ma yin no //üîΩde lta na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na tha ma nyid du mi 'gyur ro // de'i phyir de dag mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ma yin no // de lta na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: If that is so, then the immediately preceding condition would not exist.üîΩIf the immediately preceding condition does not exist, then the mental faculty would not exist.

original: drug po 'gags ma thag pa'i rnam par shes pa yid yin no zhes bshad na /
analyzed: drug po 'gags ma thag pa'i rnam par shes pa yid yin no zhes bshad na /
translated: If the mental faculty does not exist, then the six consciousnesses would not exist.üîΩIf the six consciousnesses do not exist, then name and form would not exist.üîΩIf name and form do not exist, then the six sense bases would not exist.üîΩIf the six sense bases do not exist, then contact would not exist.üîΩIf contact does not exist, then feeling would not exist.üîΩIf feeling does not exist, then craving would not exist.üîΩIf craving does not exist, then grasping would not exist.üîΩIf grasping does not exist, then existence would not exist.üîΩIf existence does not exist, then birth would not exist.

original: 'dir ni de gang gi 'das ma thag par 'gyur ba'i rnam par shes pa de yod pa ma yin no //üîΩyid ni rten gyi dngos pos rab tu phye ba yin gyi zhes rgyas par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'dir ni de gang gi 'das ma thag par 'gyur ba'i rnam par shes pa de yod pa ma yin no // yid ni rten gyi dngos pos rab tu phye ba yin gyi zhes rgyas par 'byung ngo //
translated: If birth does not exist, then aging and death would not exist.üîΩIf aging and death do not exist, then the twelve members would not exist.üîΩIf the twelve members do not exist, then the twelve members would be nonexistent.üîΩIf the twelve members are nonexistent, then the twelve members would be nonexistent.

original: shes pa de ma thag pa med na ji ltar rten gyi dngos po yin zhe na /
analyzed: shes pa de ma thag pa med na ji ltar rten gyi dngos po yin zhe na /
translated: If the twelve members are nonexistent, then the twelve members would be nonexistent.üîΩIf the twelve members are nonexistent, then the twelve members would be nonexistent.üîΩIf the twelve members are nonexistent, then the twelve members would be nonexistent.üîΩIf the twelve members are nonexistent, then the twelve members would be nonexistent.üîΩIf the twelve members are nonexistent, then the twelve members would be nonexistent.üîΩIf the twelve members are nonexistent, then the twelve members would be nonexistent.üîΩIf the twelve members are nonexistent, then the twelve members would be nonexistent.üîΩIf the twelve members are nonexistent, then the twelve members would be nonexistent.üîΩIf the twelve members are nonexistent, then the twelve members would be nonexistent.üîΩIf the twelve members are nonexistent, then the twelve members would be nonexistent.üîΩIf the twelve members are nonexistent, then the twelve members would be nonexistent.üîΩIf the twelve members are nonexistent, then the twelve members would be nonexistent.üîΩIf the twelve members are nonexistent, then the twelve

original: de'i rten gyi dngos por gnas pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rten gyi dngos por gnas pa'i phyir te /
translated: because it exists as the basis of that.

original: mjug thogs kyi shes pa yod dam med kyang bla ste rten gyi dngos por khyad par med pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: mjug thogs kyi shes pa yod dam med kyang bla ste rten gyi dngos por khyad par med pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: Whether or not the subsequent consciousness exists, it is the basis of that, because there is no difference.

original: / dper na mig skyes pa na mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gyi dngos por gnas pa bzhin te /
analyzed: / dper na mig skyes pa na mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gyi dngos por gnas pa bzhin te /
translated: For example, when the eye is produced, it exists as the basis of eye consciousness.

original: gal te rgyu gzhan ma tshang bas mig gi rnam par shes pa mi skye na der mig gis ci nyes /
analyzed: gal te rgyu gzhan ma tshang bas mig gi rnam par shes pa mi skye na der mig gis ci nyes /
translated: If eye consciousness does not arise due to the incompleteness of other causes, what does the eye do?

original: rgyu gzhan ma tshang ba ni dgra bcom ba la yang srid pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu gzhan ma tshang ba ni dgra bcom ba la yang srid pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa med pa'o //
translated: The incompleteness of other causes is the nonexistence of karma and affliction that would produce existence even for arhats.

original: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni byed pas rab tu phye ba yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni byed pas rab tu phye ba yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: The immediately preceding condition is distinguished by its function.

original: 'bras bu skye bas rab tu phye ba yin gyi yid ltar gnas pa tsam gyis rab tu phye ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu skye bas rab tu phye ba yin gyi yid ltar gnas pa tsam gyis rab tu phye ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is distinguished by the arising of the effect, not by merely existing like the mind.

original: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he says,

original: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa de skye ba la mngon du @240a * //
analyzed: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa de skye ba la mngon du @240a * //
translated: That immediately preceding condition is distinguished by the arising of the effect.

original: phyogs pa'i chos gang 'bras bur bzung de ni thams cad dam zhes rgyas par smos so //üîΩdgra bcom pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba tha ma dag gis ni 'bras bu bzung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: phyogs pa'i chos gang 'bras bur bzung de ni thams cad dam zhes rgyas par smos so // dgra bcom pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba tha ma dag gis ni 'bras bu bzung ba ma yin te /
translated: The VaibhƒÅ·π£ika replies: The factors that are the effect of the last mind and the last thoughtconcomitants of an perfected being are not the effect of the last mind and the last thoughtconcomitants of an perfected being.üîΩThe last mind and the last thoughtconcomitants of an perfected being are not the similar and immediately antecedent condition of a first mind and a first thoughtconcomitant of the next existence, because they are not followed by these factors.üîΩThe factors that are the effect of the last mind and the last thoughtconcomitants of an perfected being are not the effect of the last mind and the last thoughtconcomitants of an perfected being.üîΩThe last mind and the last thoughtconcomitants of an perfected being are not the similar and immediately antecedent condition of a first mind and a first thoughtconcomitant of the next existence, because they are not followed by these factors.

original: de'i phyir de dag skyes bu'i byed pa med pa yin pa'i phyir mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag skyes bu'i byed pa med pa yin pa'i phyir mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ma yin no //
translated: The factors that are the effect of the last mind and the last thoughtconcomitants of an perfected being are not the effect of the last mind and the last thoughtconcomitants of an perfected being.üîΩThe last mind and the last thoughtconcomitants of an perfected being are not the similar and immediately antecedent condition of a first mind and a first thoughtconcomitant of the next existence, because they are not followed by these factors.

original: gang dag la sems mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen du yod pa de dag ni sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can no //
analyzed: gang dag la sems mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen du yod pa de dag ni sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can no //
translated: The factors that are the effect of the last mind and the last thoughtconcomitants of an perfected being are not the effect of the last mind and the last thoughtconcomitants of an perfected being.

original: skad cig gzhan gyis bar ma chod pa'i phyir na sems kyi de ma thag pa rkyen no //
analyzed: skad cig gzhan gyis bar ma chod pa'i phyir na sems kyi de ma thag pa rkyen no //
translated: The last mind and the last thoughtconcomitants of an perfected being are not the similar and immediately antecedent condition of a first mind and a first thoughtconcomitant of the next existence, because they are not followed by these factors.

original: sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las so //üîΩsdang ba'i sems zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las so //üîΩsdang ba'i sems zhes bya ba la /
translated: The factors that are the effect of the last mind and the last thoughtconcomitants of an perfected being are not the effect of the last mind and the last thoughtconcomitants of an perfected being.üîΩThe last mind and the last thoughtconcomitants of an perfected being are not the similar and immediately antecedent condition of a first mind and a first thoughtconcomitant of the next existence, because they are not followed by these factors.üîΩThe factors that are the effect of the last mind and the last thoughtconcomitants of an perfected being are not the effect of the last mind and the last thoughtconcomitants of

original: de'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen snyoms par 'jug ba'i sems yin pas sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can yin gyi ;
analyzed: de'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen snyoms par 'jug ba'i sems yin pas sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can yin gyi ;
translated: Because the mind of meditative attainment is its equivalent immediately preceding condition, it possesses equivalent immediately preceding minds.

original: sems kyi de ma thag pa can ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sems kyi de ma thag pa can ni ma yin te /
translated: But it does not possess immediately preceding minds

original: snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma rnams kyis bar du bcad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma rnams kyis bar du bcad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is obstructed by the moments of meditative attainment.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa dag kyang snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma dang pos chod pa'i phyir sems kyi de ma thag pa can ma yin la ;
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa dag kyang snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma dang pos chod pa'i phyir sems kyi de ma thag pa can ma yin la ;
translated: Also, the second moment of meditative attainment does not possess immediately preceding minds because it is obstructed by the first moment of meditative attainment.

original: sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can ni yin te /
analyzed: sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can ni yin te /
translated: But it possesses equivalent immediately preceding minds

original: snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the equivalent immediately preceding condition of the mind of meditative attainment.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma dang po zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma dang po zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: The first moment of meditative attainment and so on.

original: sems de ni skye ba la sogs pa dag gi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ma yin pas de dag sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can ma yin la /üîΩsems kyi de ma thag pa can ni yin te /
analyzed: sems de ni skye ba la sogs pa dag gi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ma yin pas de dag sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can ma yin la / sems kyi de ma thag pa can ni yin te /
translated: But they are equivalent and immediate antecedents of mind,

original: skad cig ma gzhan gyis mchod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig ma gzhan gyis mchod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are obstructed by another moment.

original: sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir na sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can ni ma yin te //
analyzed: sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir na sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can ni ma yin te //
translated: They are not equivalent and immediate antecedents of mind, because they are not by nature equivalent and immediate antecedents of mind.

original: sems dang sems las byung ba snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis dang bcas pa rnams kho na sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can du 'dod do //
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis dang bcas pa rnams kho na sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can du 'dod do //
translated: Only mind and mental factors, together with the two meditative states of composure, are considered to be equivalent and immediate antecedents of mind.

original: sems dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs kyi skye ba la sogs pa'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sems dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs kyi skye ba la sogs pa'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The birth, etc., of the states that are accompanied by mind.

original: ci zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhe na /
translated: What is meant by ‚Äúthe birth, etc.‚Äù?

original: sems kyi de ma thag pa can yin gyi /
analyzed: sems kyi de ma thag pa can yin gyi /
translated: They are equivalent and immediate antecedents of mind,

original: @240b sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can ni ma yin no //
analyzed: @240b sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can ni ma yin no //
translated: but they are not equivalent and immediate antecedents of mind.

original: mu gsum pa ni zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mu gsum pa ni zhes bya ba la /
translated: The third alternative is:

original: snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma dang po ste /üîΩde ni sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can yang yin la /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma dang po ste / de ni sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can yang yin la /
translated: The first moment of meditative attainment

original: sems kyi de ma thag pa can yang yin no //
analyzed: sems kyi de ma thag pa can yang yin no //
translated: is both a homogeneous immediately preceding condition of mind and an immediately preceding condition of mind.

original: sems dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs dag go zhes bya ba la ;
analyzed: sems dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs dag go zhes bya ba la ;
translated: The phrase ‚Äústates that possess mind‚Äù refers to

original: gang gi tshe sems las sems gzhan skye ba de'i tshe sems dang sems las byung ba phyi ma rnams sems snga mas sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can yang yin la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sems las sems gzhan skye ba de'i tshe sems dang sems las byung ba phyi ma rnams sems snga mas sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can yang yin la /
translated: when one mind arises from another mind, the later minds and mental factors are both a homogeneous immediately preceding condition of mind and an immediately preceding condition of mind.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúthe first moment of meditative attainment‚Äù refers to

original: sems kyi de ma thag pa can yang yin no //
analyzed: sems kyi de ma thag pa can yang yin no //
translated: the first moment of meditative attainment and the first moment of the mind of emanation.

original: mu bzhi pa ni zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mu bzhi pa ni zhes bya ba la /
translated: The fourth possibility is

original: snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs pa dang ; ldang ba'i sems kyi skye ba la sogs pa dag ni sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs pa dang ; ldang ba'i sems kyi skye ba la sogs pa dag ni sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: the second moment of meditative attainment and so on, the arising of the mind of emanation and so on, because they are not by nature a homogeneous immediately preceding condition of mind.

original: sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can ma yin la /
analyzed: sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can ma yin la /
translated: They are not a homogeneous immediately preceding condition of mind.

original: skad cig ma gzhan gyis chod pa'i phyir sems kyi de ma thag pa can ma yin no //
analyzed: skad cig ma gzhan gyis chod pa'i phyir sems kyi de ma thag pa can ma yin no //
translated: It is not associated with the mind immediately preceding it because it is separated from it by another moment.üîΩThe third and fourth are the first and second.

original: gsum pa dang bzhi pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni dang po dang gnyis pa dag go //üîΩdang po dang gnyis pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni gsum pa dang bzhi pa dag yin par bshad do zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gsum pa dang bzhi pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni dang po dang gnyis pa dag go // dang po dang gnyis pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni gsum pa dang bzhi pa dag yin par bshad do zhes bya ba la /
translated: The first and second are the third and fourth.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma dang po dang / sems dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs 'di ni der mu gsum pa yin la 'dir ni dang po ste /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma dang po dang / sems dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs 'di ni der mu gsum pa yin la 'dir ni dang po ste /
translated: The first moment of meditative attainment and the state of having mind are the third alternative in that context, but here they are the first.

original: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i phyir sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can yin la /üîΩsnyoms par 'jug pa'i de ma thag pa can ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i phyir sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can yin la / snyoms par 'jug pa'i de ma thag pa can ni ma yin te /
translated: They are associated with the mind that is equivalent immediately preceding it because they are generated by the equivalent immediately preceding condition.

original: de'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyis sbyor ba'i sems snyoms par 'jug pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyis sbyor ba'i sems snyoms par 'jug pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are not associated with meditative attainment that is equivalent immediately preceding it because the mind of preparation is not meditative attainment that is equivalent immediately preceding it.

original: skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyi skye ba la sogs pa ni der mu bzhi pa yin la /
analyzed: skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyi skye ba la sogs pa ni der mu bzhi pa yin la /
translated: The arising of mind possessing two moments and so on is the fourth possibility there.

original: 'dir ni gnyis pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni gnyis pa ste /
translated: But here it is the second possibility.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa dang chod pa med pa'i phyir snyoms par 'jug pa'i de ma thag pa can yin la /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa dang chod pa med pa'i phyir snyoms par 'jug pa'i de ma thag pa can yin la /
translated: It is antecedent to meditative attainment because it is not obstructed by meditative attainment.

original: sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can ma yin no //üîΩsnyoms par 'jug pa'i sems ni de dag gi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ma yin te ;
analyzed: sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can ma yin no // snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems ni de dag gi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ma yin te ;
translated: But it is not antecedent to the mind that is equivalent and immediately preceding.

original: sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The mind of meditative attainment is not the equivalent and immediately preceding condition of those minds because it is not by nature equivalent and immediately preceding to mind.

original: sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ldang pa'i sems dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs pa dag ni der mu dang po yin la /
analyzed: sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ldang pa'i sems dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs pa dag ni der mu dang po yin la /
translated: The mind that arises from mindless meditative attainment and the second moment of meditative attainment and so on are the first possibility there.

original: 'dir ni gsum pa ste /üîΩsems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can dang / @241a * //
analyzed: 'dir ni gsum pa ste / sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can dang / @241a * //
translated: But here it is the third possibility.üîΩIt is antecedent to the mind that is equivalent and immediately preceding.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa'i de ma thag pa can yin no //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa'i de ma thag pa can yin no //
translated: It is antecedent to meditative attainment.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma dang po dang / sems dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs kyi skye ba la sogs pa ni der mu gnyis pa yin te /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma dang po dang / sems dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs kyi skye ba la sogs pa ni der mu gnyis pa yin te /
translated: The first moment of meditative attainment and birth, etc., in a state possessing mind are the second alternative there.

original: chos de dag ni sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma snga ma med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chos de dag ni sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma snga ma med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because those phenomena are not by nature equivalent immediately preceding conditions of mind and because the prior moment of meditative attainment does not exist.

original: sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can yang ma yin la /
analyzed: sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can yang ma yin la /
translated: They are not equivalent immediately preceding conditions of mind.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa'i de ma thag pa can yang ma yin no //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa'i de ma thag pa can yang ma yin no //
translated: They are not equivalent immediately preceding conditions of meditative attainment.

original: da ni ji ltar ldang ba'i sems yun ring mo zhig tu chad pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: da ni ji ltar ldang ba'i sems yun ring mo zhig tu chad pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: Now, how does the mind of emergence arise after a long time?

original: de'i phyir sems gzhan gyis ma chod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sems gzhan gyis ma chod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it is said, because it is not obstructed by other minds.

original: sems kyi bar gcod par byed pa ni sems yin te /
analyzed: sems kyi bar gcod par byed pa ni sems yin te /
translated: Mind is the obstruction of mind.

original: ldan pa ma yin pa ni ma yin no zhes bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ldan pa ma yin pa ni ma yin no zhes bshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is not nonassociated formative factors.

original: dmigs pa chos rnams thams cad do //
analyzed: dmigs pa chos rnams thams cad do //
translated: All phenomena are its object field.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: üîΩüîΩ

original: sems dang sems las byung ba'i yul las gzhan pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang yong pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba'i yul las gzhan pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang yong pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no dharma whatsoever that is other than the object of mind and mental factors.

original: thams cad dmigs pa yin gyi thams cad kyi ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir ci rigs par zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: thams cad dmigs pa yin gyi thams cad kyi ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir ci rigs par zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: In order to show that all are objects, but not all are objects of all, he says, as is fitting.

original: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa'i ni gzugs so zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
analyzed: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa'i ni gzugs so zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
translated: In order to show just that, he says, for example, the form is of eye consciousness together with its concomitant factors, and so on.

original: de lta bu'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de ni yul gyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de lta bu'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de ni yul gyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because it has such a characteristic means because it has the characteristic of an object.

original: de nyid la dpe ni dper na shing la sogs pa mi sreg kyang de lta bu'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir bud shing zhes bya ba bzhin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid la dpe ni dper na shing la sogs pa mi sreg kyang de lta bu'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir bud shing zhes bya ba bzhin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The example for that is, for example, even though wood and so on are not burned, because they have such a characteristic, they are called fuel.

original: skye mched dang rdzas dang skad cig nges pas zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
analyzed: skye mched dang rdzas dang skad cig nges pas zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
translated: Because of the determination of the sense base, substance, and moment.

original: de la skye mched nges pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa'i dmigs pa ni gzugs kyi skye ma ched yin la /
analyzed: de la skye mched nges pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa'i dmigs pa ni gzugs kyi skye ma ched yin la /
translated: As for the determination of the sense-sphere, the object of the eye consciousness together with its associates is the sense-sphere of visible form.

original: gzhan ma yin ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan ma yin ba'o //
translated: It is not any other.

original: rdzas nges pa ni gzugs sngon po 'dzin par byed pa'i dmigs pa ni de kho na yin la ser po la sogs pa ma yin no //üîΩskad cig ma nges pa ni skad cig ma gang zhig gang gi dmigs pa yin pa de kho na de'i dmigs pa yin la ;
analyzed: rdzas nges pa ni gzugs sngon po 'dzin par byed pa'i dmigs pa ni de kho na yin la ser po la sogs pa ma yin no // skad cig ma nges pa ni skad cig ma gang zhig gang gi dmigs pa yin pa de kho na de'i dmigs pa yin la ;
translated: As for the determination of substance, the object of the consciousness apprehending blue is just that, and not yellow, etc.

original: gzhan ma yin pa'o //üîΩbdag nyid ji lta bar zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa'o // bdag nyid ji lta bar zhes bya ba la /
translated: As for the determination of moment, the object of whatever moment is just that, and not any other.üîΩAs for the determination of the mode of apprehension, the object of the consciousness apprehending blue is just blue, and not form, etc.üîΩAs for the determination of the mode of being, the object of the consciousness apprehending blue is just blue, and not the absence of blue.üîΩAs for the determination of the mode of appearance, the object of the consciousness apprehending blue appears as blue, and not as the absence of blue.üîΩAs for the determination of the mode of apprehension and the mode of being, the object of the consciousness apprehending blue is blue, and not the absence of blue.üîΩAs for the determination of the mode of appearance and the mode of being, the object of the consciousness apprehending blue appears as blue, and is blue, and not the absence of blue.

original: gang gi dmigs pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gang gi dmigs pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: As for the determination of the mode of apprehension, the mode of appearance, and the mode of being, the object of the consciousness apprehending blue is blue, and appears as blue, and is apprehended as blue.

original: rna ba la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa yang sgra la sogs pa dag la de dang 'dra bar sbyar bar bya'o //üîΩsmras pa de bzhin te zhes bya ba 'di ni de ltar yin no zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rna ba la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa yang sgra la sogs pa dag la de dang 'dra bar sbyar bar bya'o //üîΩsmras pa de bzhin te zhes bya ba 'di ni de ltar yin no zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The determination of the object of the ear consciousness and so on should be applied in the same way to sound, etc.

original: mig gi rnam @241b par shes pa ni mig gi rten can kho na yin no //
analyzed: mig gi rnam @241b par shes pa ni mig gi rten can kho na yin no //
translated: The eye consciousness is supported by the eye alone,

original: gzhan gyi rten can ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi rten can ma yin no //
translated: not by another.

original: 'di'i rdzas nges pa yang skye mched nges pa ltar khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di'i rdzas nges pa yang skye mched nges pa ltar khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: The certainty of its substance should be understood as the certainty of its base.

original: de bzhin du rna ba la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: The same should be said of the ear consciousness and so on.

original: skyes pa rnams ni rten dang lhan cig nges pa dag yin te /
analyzed: skyes pa rnams ni rten dang lhan cig nges pa dag yin te /
translated: The present ones are certain to be simultaneous with their bases,

original: de skye ba rten med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de skye ba rten med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they do not arise without a base.

original: 'das pa rnams kyang rten dang lhan cig pa dag yin no zhes bya ba ni rten gang dang lhan cig skyes nas 'gags pa rnams te /
analyzed: 'das pa rnams kyang rten dang lhan cig pa dag yin no zhes bya ba ni rten gang dang lhan cig skyes nas 'gags pa rnams te /
translated: The past ones are also simultaneous with their bases, because those that have arisen and ceased are simultaneous with their bases.

original: gzhan du na 'das pa'i mig rten pa dang bcas par gzhag tu med do //üîΩbyed rgyu zhes bya bdag por bshad //
analyzed: gzhan du na 'das pa'i mig rten pa dang bcas par gzhag tu med do // byed rgyu zhes bya bdag por bshad //
translated: Otherwise, the past eye could not be posited as having a base.

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: The active cause is said to be the dominant condition.

original: 'dis ni bdag nyid ma gtogs pa'i chos thams cad ni bdag po'i rkyen yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis ni bdag nyid ma gtogs pa'i chos thams cad ni bdag po'i rkyen yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: This teaches that all phenomena, except for the phenomenon itself, are dominant conditions.

original: rkyen 'di ni rgyu dang mtshungs pa de ma thag pa dang dmigs pa'i rkyen dag pas lhag pa yin pas na bdag po'i rkyen no //
analyzed: rkyen 'di ni rgyu dang mtshungs pa de ma thag pa dang dmigs pa'i rkyen dag pas lhag pa yin pas na bdag po'i rkyen no //
translated: This condition is called the dominant condition because it is superior to the other two conditions, the immediately preceding condition and the objective condition, which are similar to the causal condition.

original: 'di ji ltar lhag ce na /
analyzed: 'di ji ltar lhag ce na /
translated: How is it superior?

original: rang gi ngo bor ma gtogs pa'i chos thams cad bdag po'i rkyen yin pa de ltar rgyu dang mtshungs pa de ma thag pa dang dmigs pa'i rkyen dag ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bor ma gtogs pa'i chos thams cad bdag po'i rkyen yin pa de ltar rgyu dang mtshungs pa de ma thag pa dang dmigs pa'i rkyen dag ni ma yin no //
translated: All phenomena, with the exception of its own nature, are the dominant condition of a given phenomenon. This is not the case for the causal condition, the immediately preceding condition, and the objective condition.

original: chos thams cad yin la zhes bya ba la /üîΩyid kyi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa ni chos thams cad yin no zhes 'byung ba las na /
analyzed: chos thams cad yin la zhes bya ba la / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa ni chos thams cad yin no zhes 'byung ba las na /
translated: All phenomena are the objective condition.üîΩThe objective condition is all phenomena.

original: dmigs pa'i rkyen yang chos thams cad yin te /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rkyen yang chos thams cad yin te /
translated: This is stated in the line ‚ÄúThe object of mental consciousness is all phenomena.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir gang gis 'di kho na lhag par brjod pa 'di la dmigs pa'i rkyen las phul du byung ba ci yod ce na /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang gis 'di kho na lhag par brjod pa 'di la dmigs pa'i rkyen las phul du byung ba ci yod ce na /
translated: Therefore, what is the superiority of the objective condition over the other two conditions, since all phenomena are the objective condition?

original: phul du byung ba yod de /
analyzed: phul du byung ba yod de /
translated: There is a difference in superiority.

original: sems dang sems las byung ba dag gi lhan cig 'byung ba'i chos rnams ni nam yang dmigs pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba dag gi lhan cig 'byung ba'i chos rnams ni nam yang dmigs pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Coemergent phenomena are never the object of mind and mental factors.

original: bdag po'i rkyen ni yin pas chos thams cad bdag po'i rkyen bzhin du dmigs pa'i rkyen ma yin te /üîΩrang las gzhan pa byed rgyu'i rgyu //
analyzed: bdag po'i rkyen ni yin pas chos thams cad bdag po'i rkyen bzhin du dmigs pa'i rkyen ma yin te / rang las gzhan pa byed rgyu'i rgyu //
translated: The causal condition is the cause of all phenomena,

original: zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is said, ‚ÄúThe cause that is different from the effect is the active cause.‚Äù

original: yang na lhag pa'i rkyen yin te //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yang na lhag pa'i rkyen yin te // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Or, the objective condition is the dominant condition.

original: lhag pa'i zhes bya ba ni mang po'i 'o //
analyzed: lhag pa'i zhes bya ba ni mang po'i 'o //
translated: Here, ‚Äúdominant‚Äù is a plural

original: thams cad rang gi ngo bor ma gtogs pa'i zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: thams cad rang gi ngo bor ma gtogs pa'i zhes bya ba la /
translated: All phenomena are not the objective conditions of all phenomena, because

original: thams cad sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad kyi dmigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: thams cad sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad kyi dmigs pa ma yin te /
translated: all phenomena are not the objects of all minds and mental factors.

original: dmigs pa'i rkyen ni sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kho na'i yin te /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rkyen ni sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kho na'i yin te /
translated: The objective condition is only of minds and mental factors,

original: gzhan dag gi dmigs pa'i rkyen ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dag gi dmigs pa'i rkyen ma yin no //
translated: because it is not the objective condition of other phenomena.

original: bdag po'i rkyen ni sems dang sems las byung ba dang / gzhan dag gi yang yin la /
analyzed: bdag po'i rkyen ni sems dang sems las byung ba dang / gzhan dag gi yang yin la /
translated: The dominant condition is of minds and mental factors and of other phenomena,üîΩbecause it is like the essence of a phenomenon itself.

original: @242a * // rang gi ngo bo'i rang gi ngo bo lta bu'o zhes bya ba la ci zhe na /
analyzed: @242a * // rang gi ngo bo'i rang gi ngo bo lta bu'o zhes bya ba la ci zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of ‚Äúlike the essence of a phenomenon itself‚Äù?

original: rkyen bzhi char gyis kyang rkyen ma yin te /
analyzed: rkyen bzhi char gyis kyang rkyen ma yin te /
translated: The four conditions are not conditions of themselves.

original: rkyen gyi mtshan nyid ji skad du bshad pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rkyen gyi mtshan nyid ji skad du bshad pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the characteristics of conditions as they have been explained are impossible.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi 'dus byas lta bu dang // zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi 'dus byas lta bu dang // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Like the produced in the unproduced.

original: bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not to be produced.

original: rgyu gnyis po dag 'gag pa la ltung byed do zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rgyu gnyis po dag 'gag pa la ltung byed do zhes bya ba la /
translated: The two causes function in regard to cessation.

original: 'gag pa kho na la bya ba byed do zhes bya bar nges par gzung gi / gnyis po dag kho na zhes bya bar ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni skye ba'i dbang du byas nas yin gyi /
analyzed: 'gag pa kho na la bya ba byed do zhes bya bar nges par gzung gi / gnyis po dag kho na zhes bya bar ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni skye ba'i dbang du byas nas yin gyi /
translated: It is ascertained that the function is performed only in regard to cessation, not that the two causes function only in regard to cessation.

original: 'gag pa'i dbang du byas nas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'gag pa'i dbang du byas nas ni ma yin te /
translated: This is in terms of arising, not in terms of cessation,

original: byed pa'i dus kho nar 'bras bu 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa'i dus kho nar 'bras bu 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the effect arises at the time of the function.

original: bya ba ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: bya ba ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: The function is threefold:

original: 'bras bu 'dzin pa dang / 'bras bu 'byin pa dang / yul nye bar longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu 'dzin pa dang / 'bras bu 'byin pa dang / yul nye bar longs spyod pa'o //
translated: the holding of the effect, the production of the effect, and the enjoyment of the object.

original: de gnyis ni lhan cig 'byung ba'i 'bras bu la bya ba byed do zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de gnyis ni lhan cig 'byung ba'i 'bras bu la bya ba byed do zhes bya ba la /
translated: Those two function in regard to the co-arisen effect.

original: ji ltar de gnyis de la bya ba byed ce na phan tshun 'bras bu 'dzin pa dang 'byin par nus pa nyid kyis te /
analyzed: ji ltar de gnyis de la bya ba byed ce na phan tshun 'bras bu 'dzin pa dang 'byin par nus pa nyid kyis te /
translated: How do these two act as conditions for that? They act as conditions through the power of mutual possession of the result and the power of mutual production of the result.

original: phan tshun bral bas yul 'dzin par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun bral bas yul 'dzin par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is untenable that they apprehend the object without mutual separation.üîΩThe third acts in relation to arising.

original: gsum po ni skye ba la'o zhes bya ba la skye ba kho na la'o zhes bya bar nges par gzung ngo //üîΩgang gi phyir rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dag 'phangs pa'i dbang gis skye ba de'i phyir ska la ba mnyam pa'i rgyu la sogs pa'i rgyu dag ni skye bzhin pa la bya ba byed do //
analyzed: gsum po ni skye ba la'o zhes bya ba la skye ba kho na la'o zhes bya bar nges par gzung ngo // gang gi phyir rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dag 'phangs pa'i dbang gis skye ba de'i phyir ska la ba mnyam pa'i rgyu la sogs pa'i rgyu dag ni skye bzhin pa la bya ba byed do //
translated: The third, the dominant condition, acts in relation to arising.üîΩBecause the result of natural outflow and the result of karmic maturation arise through the power of being projected, the homogeneous cause and so on act as causes in relation to that which is arising.üîΩThe two causes, the homogeneous cause and the omnipresent cause, act as causes in relation to that which is arising.üîΩThe homogeneous cause acts as a cause in relation to that which is arising because it is said that the homogeneous cause is the cause of similar type.

original: re zhig skal ba mnyam pa dang // kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu gnyis pa ni mjug thogs su rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yod pas 'bras bu skye bzhin pa la bya ba byed par 'gyur na /
analyzed: re zhig skal ba mnyam pa dang // kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu gnyis pa ni mjug thogs su rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yod pas 'bras bu skye bzhin pa la bya ba byed par 'gyur na /
translated: The omnipresent cause acts as a cause in relation to that which is arising because it is said that the omnipresent cause is the cause of the afflicted view of the self and so on.

original: rnam par smin pa'i rgyu la ni mjug thogs su rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu med pas de ji ltar skye bzhin pa la bya ba byed par rung zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rgyu la ni mjug thogs su rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu med pas de ji ltar skye bzhin pa la bya ba byed par rung zhe na /
translated: Since the cause of karmic maturation does not have the effect of karmic maturation immediately after it, how could it be tenable that it functions when arising?

original: 'dir bya ba'i sgras ni nus pa la brjod de /
analyzed: 'dir bya ba'i sgras ni nus pa la brjod de /
translated: Here the term function refers to the power of the cause.

original: rgyu bskal pa du mas ma chod par 'gags kyang de'i mthu kho nas de'i 'bras bu 'byin par nus pa la bya ba'i sgras nye bar 'dogs so //
analyzed: rgyu bskal pa du mas ma chod par 'gags kyang de'i mthu kho nas de'i 'bras bu 'byin par nus pa la bya ba'i sgras nye bar 'dogs so //
translated: Even though the cause has ceased without being interrupted by other causes for many eons, the power of that cause alone is designated by the term function since it is capable of producing its effect.

original: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni skye ba la bya ba byed de /
analyzed: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni skye ba la bya ba byed de /
translated: The condition as equivalent and immediate antecedent functions when arising.

original: drangs te skabs 'byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: drangs te skabs 'byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the condition as equivalent and immediate antecedent because it draws and opens a gap.

original: dmigs pa'i rkyen ni 'gag pa la bya ba byed de /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rkyen ni 'gag pa la bya ba byed de /
translated: The objective condition functions when ceasing.

original: da ltar gyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi yul 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: da ltar gyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi yul 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The objective condition is the object of the present mind and mental factors because it apprehends objects.

original: 'di ltar dmigs pa'i rkyen ni 'dzin pa'i don gyis rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar dmigs pa'i rkyen ni 'dzin pa'i don gyis rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: Thus the objective condition is posited as the object of apprehension.

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyis ni gzung bar bya ba'i don 'dzin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyis ni gzung bar bya ba'i don 'dzin pa ma yin no //
translated: Past and future minds and mental factors do not grasp the object to be grasped.

original: bdag po'i rkyen ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: bdag po'i rkyen ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The dominant condition, etc.

original: 'di'i bya ba ni mi sgrib pa'i ngo bo nyid du gnas @242b pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i bya ba ni mi sgrib pa'i ngo bo nyid du gnas @242b pa yin te /
translated: Its activity is to remain in a state of non-obstruction.

original: de ni skye ba dang 'gag pa la khyad par med pas de ni gnas skabs thams cad du bya ba byed par brjod do //
analyzed: de ni skye ba dang 'gag pa la khyad par med pas de ni gnas skabs thams cad du bya ba byed par brjod do //
translated: Since it is without distinction in regard to arising and cessation, it is said to perform its activity in all circumstances.üîΩThe mind and mental factors arise

original: bzhi yis sems dang sems las byung ba rnams //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bzhi yis sems dang sems las byung ba rnams // zhes bya ba la /
translated: from four conditions.

original: ni zhes bya ba'i sgras ni sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ni bzhi kho nas yin no zhes nges par gzung bar bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: ni zhes bya ba'i sgras ni sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ni bzhi kho nas yin no zhes nges par gzung bar bya ba'i don te /
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù in the verse is for the purpose of determining that the mind and mental factors arise from only four conditions.

original: rgyu dang mtshungs pa de ma thag pa dang dmigs pa dang bdag po'i rkyen rnams kyis yin gyi /
analyzed: rgyu dang mtshungs pa de ma thag pa dang dmigs pa dang bdag po'i rkyen rnams kyis yin gyi /
translated: They arise from causal, similar immediately antecedent, objective, and dominant conditions.

original: gcig sam gnyis gam gsum gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig sam gnyis gam gsum gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: They do not arise from one, two, or three conditions.

original: gzhan dag na re ni /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re ni /
translated: Others say:

original: ni zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rgyu bstan pa'i don du ste /
analyzed: ni zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rgyu bstan pa'i don du ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù indicates the cause.

original: gang gi phyir sems dang sems las byung ba yin pa de'i phyir bzhi dag gis yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sems dang sems las byung ba yin pa de'i phyir bzhi dag gis yin te /
translated: Since they are mind and mental factors, they are the four conditions.üîΩThe objective condition does not act on other states.üîΩThe five causes are not the causal condition of all dharmas.

original: dmigs pa'i rkyen ni gzhan la bya ba mi byed do zhes zer ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rkyen ni gzhan la bya ba mi byed do zhes zer ro //
translated: What are the five causes?üîΩThe five causes are the active cause, co-existent cause, homogeneous cause, concomitant cause, and the cause of karmic maturation.üîΩThe active cause is like this:üîΩThe eye sense faculty is the active cause of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe co-existent cause is like this:üîΩThe four primary elements are the co-existent cause of the four derived matter.üîΩThe homogeneous cause is like this:üîΩThe five aggregates of a past life are the homogeneous cause of the five aggregates of a present life.

original: de la ni 'di dag gi rgyu'i rkyen ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: de la ni 'di dag gi rgyu'i rkyen ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: The concomitant cause is like this:üîΩThe five aggregates are the concomitant cause of the five aggregates.üîΩThe cause of karmic maturation is like this:üîΩThe five karmic actions are the cause of karmic maturation.

original: rgyu lnga po thams cad ni thams cad kyi rgyu'i rkyen ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu lnga po thams cad ni thams cad kyi rgyu'i rkyen ma yin te /
translated: The active cause is not the cause of all dharmas.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What are the active causes of what?üîΩThe active cause of the eye consciousness is the eye sense faculty.üîΩThe active cause of the ear consciousness is the ear sense faculty.üîΩThe active cause of the nose consciousness is the nose sense faculty.üîΩThe active cause of the tongue consciousness is the tongue sense faculty.üîΩThe active cause of the body consciousness is the body sense faculty.üîΩThe active cause of the mental consciousness is the immediately preceding condition.üîΩThe co-existent cause is not the cause of all dharmas.

original: ci rigs par yin no //
analyzed: ci rigs par yin no //
translated: What are the co-existent causes of what?üîΩThe four primary elements are the co-existent cause of the four derived matter.üîΩThe homogeneous cause is not the cause of all dharmas.üîΩWhat are the homogeneous causes of what?

original: gang zhig gang gi gang dag gi rkyen yin pa de ni sngar /üîΩnyon mongs can dang rnam smin skyes //
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi gang dag gi rkyen yin pa de ni sngar / nyon mongs can dang rnam smin skyes //
translated: The five aggregates of a past life are the homogeneous cause of the five aggregates of a present life.üîΩThe concomitant cause is not the cause of all dharmas.

original: lhag dang zhes bya ba rgyas par bshad zin to //
analyzed: lhag dang zhes bya ba rgyas par bshad zin to //
translated: What are the concomitant causes of what?

original: snga ma zhes bya ba ni phyis skyes pa gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga ma zhes bya ba ni phyis skyes pa gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The five aggregates are the concomitant cause of the five aggregates.üîΩThe cause of karmic maturation is not the cause of all dharmas.

original: de lta na gzhan dag gis bar du mchod pa yang yin par thal lo zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na gzhan dag gis bar du mchod pa yang yin par thal lo zhe na /
translated: What are the causes of karmic maturation of what?üîΩThe five karmic actions are the cause of karmic maturation.üîΩThe five karmic actions are the five karmic actions of body and speech and the three karmic actions of mind.

original: gzhan gyis bar du mchod pa rnams so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis bar du mchod pa rnams so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: and those that are not obstructed by others.

original: sems dang sems las byung ba dag gis zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba dag gis zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúby minds and mental factors‚Äù is supplied.

original: de dag gi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni rang gi rigs sngar skyes pas skabs phye ba la rag las te /
analyzed: de dag gi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni rang gi rigs sngar skyes pas skabs phye ba la rag las te /
translated: The condition as the equivalent and immediate antecedent is dependent on the opening created by the prior arising of a factor of the same type.

original: skyes pa'i phyir snga ma yin zhing /
analyzed: skyes pa'i phyir snga ma yin zhing /
translated: It is prior because it has already arisen.

original: de dag la gzhan dag gis bar du ma chod pa yin no //üîΩci rigs par yul lnga po dag dang zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de dag la gzhan dag gis bar du ma chod pa yin no // ci rigs par yul lnga po dag dang zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is not obstructed by other factors.üîΩThe five sense objects are the object condition of the five corresponding forms of consciousness.

original: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi dmigs pa'i rkyen ni go rims bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa yul lnga po dag yin no //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi dmigs pa'i rkyen ni go rims bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa yul lnga po dag yin no //
translated: The five sense objects, such as form, etc., are the object condition of the five corresponding forms of consciousness, such as eye consciousness, etc., along with their associated mental factors.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa'i ni chos thams cad do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa'i ni chos thams cad do //
translated: All entities are the object condition of mental consciousness, along with its associated mental factors.

original: bdag po'i rkyen ni byed rgyu'i rgyu kho na yin pas rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa'i chos thams cad do zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: bdag po'i rkyen ni byed rgyu'i rgyu kho na yin pas rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa'i chos thams cad do zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The dominant condition is the active cause alone, therefore it is said: ‚Äúall phenomena except for its own nature.‚Äù

original: gsum gyis snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gsum gyis snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Two meditative attainments are by three.

original: gsum kho nas zhes bya bar nges par gzung ngo /
analyzed: gsum kho nas zhes bya bar nges par gzung ngo /
translated: Here, it is ascertained that they are by three alone.

original: dmigs pa'i rkyen med pa la rgyu smras pa ni de dag ni dmigs par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rkyen med pa la rgyu smras pa ni de dag ni dmigs par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reason for stating that the objective condition does not exist is that they are not that which is observed.

original: rgyu'i rkyen ni rnam pa lnga bshad @243a * //
analyzed: rgyu'i rkyen ni rnam pa lnga bshad @243a * //
translated: The causal condition is explained as fivefold.

original: na 'di gnyis ni rnam par smin pa dang / kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu ni mi srid de /
analyzed: na 'di gnyis ni rnam par smin pa dang / kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu ni mi srid de /
translated: These two meditative attainments are not possible as the causes of karmic maturation, omnipresent cause, or conjoined cause.

original: dge ba yin pa'i phyir dang / ldan pa ma yin ba yin pa'i phyir dang / de gnyis kyi phyir de nyid kyi rgyu'i rkyen ni rnam par gnyis te zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: dge ba yin pa'i phyir dang / ldan pa ma yin ba yin pa'i phyir dang / de gnyis kyi phyir de nyid kyi rgyu'i rkyen ni rnam par gnyis te zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Because they are virtuous and because they are non-conjoined, therefore the causal condition of those two is twofold.

original: sa mtshungs pa'i zhes bya ba 'byung ste ;
analyzed: sa mtshungs pa'i zhes bya ba 'byung ste ;
translated: The level of the same level arises.

original: de la 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sa mtshungs pa ni srid ba'i rtse mo'i dge ba'i phung po bzhi'o //
analyzed: de la 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sa mtshungs pa ni srid ba'i rtse mo'i dge ba'i phung po bzhi'o //
translated: The homogeneous state of the meditative attainment of cessation is the four virtuous aggregates of the summit of existence.

original: 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa'i dge ba'i phung po lnga'o //
analyzed: 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa'i dge ba'i phung po lnga'o //
translated: The homogeneous state of the meditative attainment of non-perception is the five virtuous aggregates of the fourth concentration.

original: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen no //
analyzed: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen no //
translated: The condition of equal and immediate antecedence is

original: snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gogs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma thams cad kyi'o //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gogs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma thams cad kyi'o //
translated: the meditative attainment of cessation and the meditative attainment of non-perception, together with their associated factors.

original: bdag po'i rkyen ni snga ma bzhin no zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa'i chos thams cad do /
analyzed: bdag po'i rkyen ni snga ma bzhin no zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa'i chos thams cad do /
translated: The dominant condition is as before, that is, all dharmas except for itself.

original: sems kyi mngon par 'du byed pa las skyes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sems kyi mngon par 'du byed pa las skyes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because it arises from the mental volition.

original: sems kyi mngon par 'du byed pa ni sems kyi mngon par 'du byed pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyi mngon par 'du byed pa ni sems kyi mngon par 'du byed pa'o //
translated: Mental volition is the volition of mind.

original: de gang zhig ce na /
analyzed: de gang zhig ce na /
translated: What is that?

original: sems kyi 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: sems kyi 'jug pa ste /
translated: The engagement of the mind is the mind that enters meditative attainment.

original: de las skyes pa de ni sems kyi mngon par 'du byed pa las skyes pa dag go //
analyzed: de las skyes pa de ni sems kyi mngon par 'du byed pa las skyes pa dag go //
translated: The meditative attainment arisen from that is arisen from mental application.

original: de'i dngos po ni sems kyi mngon bar 'du byed pa las skyes pa nyid de /
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni sems kyi mngon bar 'du byed pa las skyes pa nyid de /
translated: The entity of that is arisen from mental application.

original: sems kyi mngon par 'du byed pa de las skyes pa nyid kyi phyir de dag ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed kyis bsdus par gyur kyang /
analyzed: sems kyi mngon par 'du byed pa de las skyes pa nyid kyi phyir de dag ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed kyis bsdus par gyur kyang /
translated: Although they are subsumed by nonconcurrent formations because they are arisen from mental application,

original: snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can no //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can no //
translated: they possess the equivalent immediately preceding mind of meditative attainment.

original: sems skye ba la gegs byed pa'i phyir mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni ma yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sems skye ba la gegs byed pa'i phyir mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni ma yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: They are not equivalent immediately preceding conditions because they obstruct the arising of mind.

original: 'di ltar rnal 'byor pa sems dang sems las byung ba rgyu ba la ldang ba rnams sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms bar 'jug na /
analyzed: 'di ltar rnal 'byor pa sems dang sems las byung ba rgyu ba la ldang ba rnams sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms bar 'jug na /
translated: Thus when yogis who are engaged in the movement of mind and mental factors enter meditative attainment that is devoid of mind,

original: gal te sems dang sems las byung ba 'dren par byed pa yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te sems dang sems las byung ba 'dren par byed pa yin na ni /
translated: if they are drawn by mind and mental factors,

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams de la 'dod pa skye bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams de la 'dod pa skye bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: YogƒÅcƒÅras do not assert that.

original: sems dang sems las byung ba rgyu ba nges par 'byin pa yang yin la /
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba rgyu ba nges par 'byin pa yang yin la /
translated: It is also the deliverance of the movement of mind and mental factors,

original: de 'dren par byed pa 'ang yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: de 'dren par byed pa 'ang yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni 'gal ba yin no //
translated: but it is contradictory to say that it is the leader of those.

original: 'du shes med pa pa yang sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can yin pa'i phyir gsum gyis yin par rigs pa ma yin nam @243b zhe na ;
analyzed: 'du shes med pa pa yang sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can yin pa'i phyir gsum gyis yin par rigs pa ma yin nam @243b zhe na ;
translated: Isn‚Äôt it logical that the state of nondiscernment is also generated by three conditions because it has a similar mind as its equivalent immediately preceding condition?

original: 'di brjod par bya ba yin mod kyi /
analyzed: 'di brjod par bya ba yin mod kyi /
translated: This is something to be said.üîΩBut it is not generated by the formation of mind because it operates by itself since it arises from karmic maturation.

original: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir rang gi dang gis 'jug pas sems kyi 'du byed las skyes pa ma yin pa des na ma brjod do //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir rang gi dang gis 'jug pas sems kyi 'du byed las skyes pa ma yin pa des na ma brjod do //
translated: Therefore it is not mentioned.

original: 'di ni mdo phyi mar bsdu bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mdo phyi mar bsdu bar shes par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood as included in the later s≈´tra.

original: gzhan ni gnyis po dag las skye //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gzhan ni gnyis po dag las skye //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
translated: The other is generated from two.

original: gnyis po dag kho na las skye'o zhes nges par gzung ba las na dmigs par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir dmigs pa'i rkyen las ma yin la /
analyzed: gnyis po dag kho na las skye'o zhes nges par gzung ba las na dmigs par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir dmigs pa'i rkyen las ma yin la /
translated: Since it is ascertained that they arise from those two alone, they do not arise from the objective condition, because it is not an observed object.

original: sems dang sems las byung ba dang sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen las ma yin no //
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba dang sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen las ma yin no //
translated: They do not arise from the immediately preceding condition, because they are not similar minds and mental factors or the mindless meditative attainments.

original: de la rgyu'i rkyen ni /üîΩnyon mongs can dang rnam smin skyes //
analyzed: de la rgyu'i rkyen ni / nyon mongs can dang rnam smin skyes //
translated: Regarding that, the causal condition isüîΩas stated in the above explanation:

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gong du bshad pa'i rjes su 'brangs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gong du bshad pa'i rjes su 'brangs te /
translated: ‚ÄúAfflicted and arisen from karmic maturation‚Äù and so on.

original: mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu ma gtogs pa ci rigs par yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu ma gtogs pa ci rigs par yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Except for the concomitant cause, they should be understood as appropriate.

original: dngos po rnams ji skad bshad pa'i rgyu dang rkyen rnams kho na las skye'i zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: dngos po rnams ji skad bshad pa'i rgyu dang rkyen rnams kho na las skye'i zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: Things arise from just the causes and conditions explained,

original: 'di ltar rang gi lugs smras pa tsam gyis 'dod pa grub pa 'am mi 'dod pa dgag par ni mi rung ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar rang gi lugs smras pa tsam gyis 'dod pa grub pa 'am mi 'dod pa dgag par ni mi rung ste /
translated: because it is not suitable to establish assertions or refute non-assent by merely stating one‚Äôs own system.

original: de'i phyir dngos po rnams ji skad bshad pa'i rgyu dang rkyen kho na las skye'i /
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po rnams ji skad bshad pa'i rgyu dang rkyen kho na las skye'i /
translated: Therefore, things are produced only from causes and conditions as they have been explained.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgyu gcig pu dbang phyug la sogs pa ni med do zhes bya ba 'di la gtan tshigs brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgyu gcig pu dbang phyug la sogs pa ni med do zhes bya ba 'di la gtan tshigs brjod par bya'o //
translated: There is no single cause of all beings, such as God.

original: 'gro ba'i rgyu gang la dbang phyug dang skyes bu dang gtso bo rnams dang por yod pa de ni de zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i rgyu gang la dbang phyug dang skyes bu dang gtso bo rnams dang por yod pa de ni de zhes bya'o //
translated: The cause of beings is that which is first, such as God, a person, or primal matter.

original: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni dus dang / ngo bo nyid dang / rdul phra rab la sogs pa dag gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni dus dang / ngo bo nyid dang / rdul phra rab la sogs pa dag gzung ngo //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes time, intrinsic nature, atoms, and so on.

original: gal te gtan tshigs kyis byas pas grub par sems na zhes bya bas ni phyogs dang po dang 'gal bar ston te /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs kyis byas pas grub par sems na zhes bya bas ni phyogs dang po dang 'gal bar ston te /
translated: If you think that it is established by a reason, then the first position is shown to be contradictory.

original: dngos po rnams ji skad bshad pa'i rgyu dang rkyen rnams kho na las skye'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgyu gcig pu dbang phyug la sogs pa ni med do zhes bya bar grub par bya ba'i phyir dbang phyug la sogs pa las gzhan pa'i rgyu tshol ba'i phyir
analyzed: dngos po rnams ji skad bshad pa'i rgyu dang rkyen rnams kho na las skye'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgyu gcig pu dbang phyug la sogs pa ni med do zhes bya bar grub par bya ba'i phyir dbang phyug la sogs pa las gzhan pa'i rgyu tshol ba'i phyir
translated: they seek a cause other than a divine creator.

original: ro // de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni dbang phyug las gzhan pa'i rgyu khas blangs pas so //
analyzed: ro // de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni dbang phyug las gzhan pa'i rgyu khas blangs pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy that alone‚Äù means by accepting a cause other than a divine creator.

original: shes par byed pa yin pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: shes par byed pa yin pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na /
translated: If you say there is no error because it is a means of knowledge,

original: gal te dbang phyug yin na shes byed ma yin la /
analyzed: gal te dbang phyug yin na shes byed ma yin la /
translated: if it is a divine creator, it is not a means of knowledge.

original: de lta na grub pa'i byed pa po ma yin pas nyes pa de nyid du 'gyur ro //üîΩdbang phyug sogs min rim sogs phyir //
analyzed: de lta na grub pa'i byed pa po ma yin pas nyes pa de nyid du 'gyur ro // dbang phyug sogs min rim sogs phyir //
translated: If it is not that, it is not a creator, so the error remains.

original: zhes bya ba la @244a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la @244a * //
translated: Because of sequence, etc., it is not a divine creator, etc.

original: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni yul dang dus dang dngos po nges pa rnams bsdu'o //
analyzed: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni yul dang dus dang dngos po nges pa rnams bsdu'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the determination of place, time, and thing.

original: dngos po skye ba'i rim pa ni rgyu yongs su 'gyur ba la ltos pa las lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen la ltos pa yin grang /
analyzed: dngos po skye ba'i rim pa ni rgyu yongs su 'gyur ba la ltos pa las lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen la ltos pa yin grang /
translated: The process of the arising of things depends on the transformation of the cause, but it does not depend on the cooperative conditions.

original: de la rtag pa'i phyir dbang phyug la yongs su 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: de la rtag pa'i phyir dbang phyug la yongs su 'gyur ba med do //
translated: Since ƒ™≈õvara is permanent, he does not transform.

original: 'di ltar yongs su 'gyur ba ni gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid yin na /
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su 'gyur ba ni gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid yin na /
translated: In that case, transformation is just a change into something else.

original: de ni gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid du mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid du mi rigs te /
translated: But it is not tenable that he changes into something else.

original: mi rtag pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it follows he would be impermanent.

original: de'i phyir yongs su 'gyur ba la ltos te rim pa mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir yongs su 'gyur ba la ltos te rim pa mi rung ngo //
translated: Therefore the process of transformation is untenable.

original: thams cad kyi rgyu dbang phyug kho na yin pas lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen med pa'i phyir lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu'i rgyu mtshan can yang med pa nyid de /
analyzed: thams cad kyi rgyu dbang phyug kho na yin pas lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen med pa'i phyir lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu'i rgyu mtshan can yang med pa nyid de /
translated: Since ƒ™≈õvara alone is the cause of everything, the cooperative conditions do not exist. Therefore the reason for the cooperative cause also does not exist.

original: des na 'gro ba thams cad cig car 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na 'gro ba thams cad cig car 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: Thus all transmigrating beings would arise simultaneously.

original: de dag gi rgyu la khyad par med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de dag gi rgyu la khyad par med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because there is no difference in their cause.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: gal te 'gro ba dbang phyug gis byung na //
analyzed: gal te 'gro ba dbang phyug gis byung na //
